Translations.Text: adhipatyam arute karannalilanea avan mahatvattinnutamayatre. avan ella karyattinum kalivurravanan
maranavum jivitavum srsticcavan. karma nirvahanattil ninnalilerram mikaccavararenn pariksikkananat. avan ajayyanan. ere mappekunnavanum
el akasannale onninumite marreannayi srsticcavananavan. dayaparanaya avanre srstiyil oruvidha errakkuravum ninakku kananavilla. onnukuti neakku. eviteyennanum valla vitavum kanunnuntea
vintum vintum neakku. ninre kann tearr talarnn ninnilekku tanne tirike varum, tircca
teattatuttulla akasatte nam vilakkukalal alankariccu. avaye pisacukkale turattanulla banannalumakki. avarkkayi kattikkalunna narakasiksa orukkiveccittumunt
tannalute nathane nisedhikkunnavarkk narakasiksayanullat. matanniccellanulla a itam valare cittatanne
atilekk eriyappetumpeal atinre bhikara garjanam avar kelkkum. at tilaccumariyukayayirikkum
kseabhattal at peattitterikkarakum. orea sanghavum atil valicceriyappetumpeal atinre kavalkkar avareat ceadiccukeantirikkum: "ninnaluteyatutt munnariyippukararum vannirunnille?”

avar parayum: "nannalute atutt munnariyippukaran vannirunnu. pakse, nannal addehatte tallipparannu. nannalinnane vadikkukayum ceytu: allahu onnum avatarippiccittilla. ninnal keatiya valiketil tanneyan.”
avar kenukeantirikkum: "annat kelkkukayea, atekkuricc cintikkukayea ceytirunnenkil inn i narakattiyil akappettavaril petumayirunnilla.”
annane avar kurram erruparannu. narakattiyinre alkkarkku sapam
tannalute nathane kanate tanne bhayappettu jivikkunnavarea, avarkk papameacanavum mahattaya pratiphalavumunt
ninnalute vakk ninnal rahasyamakkukayea parasyamakkukayea ceyyuka. tirccayayum manas'silullatellam ariyunnavananavan
srsticcavan ariyukayillennea! avan rahasyannalariyunnavanum suksmajnaniyuman
avanan ninnalkk bhumiye adhinappetuttittannat. atinal atinre virimarilute natannukealluka. avan tanna vibhavannalilninn aharikkuka. ninnal uyirttelunnerr cellunnatum avankalekkutanne
uparileakattullavan ninnale bhumiyil alttikkalayunnatineyum appeal bhumi ilaki mariyunnatineyum sambandhicc ninnaleattum bhayappetunnille
atalla; uparileakattullavan ninnalute mel caralukal ceariyunna karrine ayakkunnatinepparri ninnalkkearu petiyumille? nam'mute takkit ennaneyuntenn valiye ninnal ariyukatanne ceyyum
avarkk mumpuntayirunnavarum satyatte tallipparannittunt. appeal evvidhamayirunnu enre siksa
tannalkku mite cirakuvitarttiyum otukkiyum parakkunna paksikale avar kanunnille. avaye tanninirttunnat dayaparanaya daivamallatarumalla. avan ella karyannalum kantariyunnavan tanne; tircca
paramakarunikanaya daivamallate ninnale sahayikkan kaliyunna sain'yametunt? urappayum i satyanisedhikal vancanayilakappettirikkukayan
allahu avanre vibhavam vilakkiyal ninnalkk annam nalkan arunt? yatharthattil avar dhikkarattilum pakayilum antupuntirikkukayan
alla, mukham nilattukutti natakkunnavanea nervali prapiccavan? atalla, satyapatayilute nivarnn natakkunnavanea
parayuka: avanan ninnale srsticcat. avan ninnalkk kelviyum kalcakalum hrdayannalum untakki. ninnal nanne kuracce nandikanikkunnullu
parayuka: avanan ninnale bhumiyil srsticcu valarttiyat. avankalekku tanneyan ninnal orumiccukuttappetunnatum
avar ceadikkunnu: ninnal satyavadikalenkil eppealan i vagdanam pularuka
parayuka: a ariv allahuvinre atukkal matram. nan vyaktamaya munnariyippu nalkunnavanallatarumalla
munnariyippayi parayunna karyam atuttettiyatayi kanumpeal satyanisedhikalute mukham visadamukamayi marum. appeal avareat parayum: "itutanneyan ninnal avasyappettukeantirunnat.”

ceadikkuka: "ninnal aleaciccittuntea? enneyum enneateappamullavareyum allahu nasippikkukayea nannaleat karuna kanikkukayea ceytuvennirikkatte; ennal neaveriya siksayilninn satyanisedhikale raksikkan arunt
parayuka: avanan dayaparan. nannal avanil visvasiccirikkunnu. avanetanneyan nannal bharamelpiccatum. aran vyaktamaya valiketilenn valiye ninnalariyukatanne ceyyum
ceadikkuka: ninnal aleaciccittuntea? ninnalute vellam varrippeayal aran ninnalkk telinirurava ettikkuka
nun. penayum avar elutivekkunnatum saksi
ninre nathanre anugrahattal ni bhrantanalla
niscayamayum ninakk nilakkatta pratiphalamunt
ni mahattaya svabhavattinutamatanne; tircca
vaikate ni kantariyum. avarum kantariyum
ninnalil aran kulappattilayatenn
niscayamayum ninre nathan vali terriyavare nannayariyunnavanan. nervali prapiccavareyum avanu nannayariyam
atinal ni satyanisedhikale anusarikkarut
ni alpam anunayam kaniccenkil tannalkkum anunayam akamayirunnuvenn avaragrahikkunnu
atikkati anayittukeantirikkunna atinicane ni anusarikkarut
avanea dusanam parayunnavan, esaniyumayi currikkarannunnavan
nanmaye tatayunnavan, atikrami, mahapapi
kruran, pinne, pilaccu perravanum
atinu karanamea samrd'dhamaya sampattum santanannalumuntennatum
nam'mute suktannal otikkelppikkappettal avan parayum: "it purvikarute purana kathakalan.”
atuttutanne avanre tumpikkaikk nam atayalamitum
ivare nam pariksana vidheyarakkiyirikkunnu. teattakkare pariksiccapeale. teattattile palannal prabhatattil tanne pariccetukkumenn avar sapatham ceyta sandarbham
avar onnum olivakkipparannilla
annane avar urannave ninre nathanilninnulla vipatt a teattatte badhiccu
at vilavetupp kalinna vayalpealeyayi
prabhatavelayil avaran'yean'yam viliccuparannu
ninnal vilavetukkunnuvenkil ninnalute krsiyitattekk neratte tanne purappettukealluka.”
an'yean'yam svakaryam parannukeant avar purappettu
daridravasikalarum innavite katannuvaranitavararut.”
avare tatayan tannal kalivurravarennavannam avar aviteyetti
ennal teattam kantappeal avar vilapikkan tutanni: "nam vali terriyirikkunnu
alla; nam ellam nastappettavarayirikkunnu.”
kuttattil madhyama nilapat svikariccayal parannu: "ninnal entukeant daivakirttanam natattunnillenn nan ceadiccirunnille?”
avar parannu: "nam'mute nathan etra parisud'dhan! niscayamayum nam akramikalayirikkunnu.”
annane avaran'yean'yam palicaran tutanni
avar vilapiccu: "nam'mute nasam! niscayamayum nam atikramikalayirikkunnu
nam'mute nathan itinekkal nallat namukk pakaram nalkiyekkam. niscayamayum nam nam'mute nathanil pratiksayarppikkunnavarakunnu.”
ivvidhaman ivitatte siksa. paraleaka siksayea kututal kathinavum. avar arinnirunnenkil
urappayum daiva bhaktarkk tannalute nathanreyatukkal anugrhitamaya svargiyaramannalunt
appeal muslinkaleatu nam kurravalikaleppealeyanea perumaruka
ninnalkkentuparri? ennaneyeakkeyan ninnal tirppu kalpikkunnat
atalla, ninnalute vasam valla vedapustakavumuntea? ninnalatil pathanam natattikkeantirikkukayanea
ninnal agrahikkunnateakke ninnalkk atiluntennea
atallenkil ninnal tirumanikkunnatu tanne ninnalkk labhikkumennatin uyirttelunnelpunal vare nilanilkkunna valla kararum nam'mute peril ninnalkkuntea
avareat ceadikkuka: tannalil aran atinre uttaravadittam elkkunnat
atalla, avarkk valla pankukarumuntea? enkil avarute pankalikale avarinn keantuvaratte. avar satyavadikalenkil
kanankal velivakkappetunnal; annavar sastangam pranamikkan vilikkappetum. ennal avarkkatinu sadhyamavilla
annavarute neattam kilpeattayirikkum. apamanam avare avaranam ceyyum. neratte avar pranamamarppikkan vilikkappettirunnallea. annavar suraksitarumayirunnu
atinal i vacanannale tallipparayunnavarute karyam enikku vittutarika. avarariyatta vidham namavare patipatiyayi pitikutum
namavarkk savakasam nalkiyirikkukayan. enre tantram bhadram tanne; tircca
alla; ni avareat valla pratiphalavum avasyappetunnuntea? annane avar katabadhyatayal kastappetukayanea
atallenkil avarute vasam valla abhetika jnanavumuntea? avar at elutiyetukkukayanea
atinal ni ninre nathanre tirumanannalkkayi ksamayeate kattirikkuka. ni a matsyakkaraneppeale akarut. addeham keatum duhkhitanayi prarthicca sandarbham orkkuka
tanre nathanilninnulla anugraham raksakkettiyirunnillenkil addeham a palmanalkkattil aksepitanayi upeksikkappetumayirunnu
avasanam addehattinre nathan addehatte terannetuttu. annane sajjanannalilulppetuttukayum ceytu
i udbeadhanam kelkkumpeal satyanisedhikal ni ninre kalitari vilumar ninne turiccu neakkunnu. ivan oru mulu bhrantan tanneyenn pulampukayum ceyyunnu
ennalit mululeakarkkumulla orudbeadhanamallateannumalla
anivarya sambhavam
entan a anivarya sambhavam
a anivarya sambhavamentenn ninakkentariyam
samudum adum a keatum vipattine tallipparannu
ennittea samud geatram keatum ketutiyal nasippikkappettu
ad geatram atyugramayi annaticca keatunkarrinalum namavasesamayi
elu ravum ettu pakalum itatatavillate allahu atine avarute nere tiriccuvittu. appeal nurumpiya ittappanattatikal peale a karrilavar uyirarru kitakkunnat ninakk kanamayirunnu
avarutetayi vallatum bakkiyayat ni kanunnuntea
pharaveanum avanu mumpullavarum kilmel marikkappetta natukalum ate kurrakrtyam tanne ceytu
avareakkeyum tannalute nathanre dutane dhikkariccu. appeal avan avare kathina siksayal pitikutukayayirunnu
pralayam paridhi katannappeal ninnale nam kappalil kayarri raksiccu
a sambhavatte nam ninnalkk orkkanulla onnakkananat. suksmatayulla katukal ekkalattekkum orearmayakkanum
pinne kahalattil orutt utappettal
bhumiyum parvatannalum peakkiyetutt rantineyum orrayatikk iticcu tarippanamakkiyal
annan anivarya sambhavam natakkuka
ann akasam peattippilarunnu. annat nanne durbalamayirikkum
malakkukal atinre nanabhagannalilumuntayirikkum. ninre nathanre sinhasanam ettuper tannalkku mukalilayi cumakkum
ann ninnal daivasannidhiyil hajarakkappetum. ninnalil ninn oru rahasyam pealum marannu kitakkukayilla
appeal karmapustakam tanrevalatu kayyil kittiyavan parayum: "ita enre karmapustakam; vayiccu neakku
enre vicaranaye nan neritentivarumenn enikkurappuntayirunnu.”
annane avan santrptamaya jivitattilettunnu

kalinna nalukalil ninnal ceytirunnatinre pratiphalamayi ita trptiyeate tinnukayum kutikkukayum ceyyuka
ennal itatu kaiyil karmapustakam kittunnavanea, avan parayum: kastam! enikkenre karmapustakam kittiyillayirunnenkil
enre kanakk entenn nan arinnirunnillenkil
maranam ellarrinreyum otukkamayirunnenkil
enre dhanam enikkeattum upakariccilla

pinne narakattiyileriyu
ennitt elupatu mulam nilamulla cannalakeant kettivariyu

oraharavumilla. vranannalute pearrayallate
papikalallate atu tinnukayilla
venta, ninnal kanunna sakala vastukkalekkeantum nan satyam ceyyunnu
ninnalkku kananavattavayekkeantum
tirccayayum it man'yanaya daivadutanre vacanannalan
it kavivakyamalla. ninnal kuracce visvasikkunnullu

it leakanathanil ninn avatirnamayatan
pravacakan nam'mute mel vallatum ketticcamacc parayukayanenkil
addehattinre valankai nam pitikkumayirunnu
ennitt addehattinre jivanadi muriccu kalayumayirunnu
appeal ninnalilarkkum addehattilninn nam'mute siksaye tatayanavilla
urappayum it bhaktanmarkk orudbeadhanaman
niscayamayum namukkariyam; ninnalil itine tallipparayunnavarunt
tirccayayum attaram satyanisedhikalkkit duhkhakaranam tanne
niscayamayum it sudrdhamaya satyaman
atinal ni ninre atyunnatanaya nathanre namam kirtticcukeantirikkuka
sambhavikkanirikkunna siksaye sambandhicc oranvesakan arannuvallea
at satyanisedhikalkkullatan. atine tatayunna arumilla
cavittupatikalute utamayaya allahuvil ninnullatanat
malakkukalum parisud'dhatmavum avanre sannidhiyilekk kayarippeakunnu. ampatinayiram keallam dairghyamulla oru dinattil

malakal katannetutta reamam pealeyum

sahadharminiyeyum saheadaraneyum nalkiyalea
tanikk abhayamekippeanna kutumbatteyum
bhumiyilulla marrellarrineyum. annane tan raksappettirunnenkil
venta! at kattikkalunna narakattiyan
teali uriccu kalayunna ti
satyatteat puram tiriyukayum pintirinnu peavukayum ceytavare at viliccuvaruttum
dhanam sekharicc suksiccuveccavareyum
manusyan ksama kettavanayan srstikkappettat
vipatt varumpeal avan vepralam kattum
nettam kittiyalea kettipputtivekkum
namaskarikkunnavarealike
avar namaskarattil nistha pularttunnavaran
avarute dhanattil nirnitamaya avakasamunt
ceadiccettunnavarkkum prathamikavasyannalkku vakayillattavarkkum
vidhidinam satyamanenn angikarikkunnavaranavar
tannalute nathanre siksaye petikkunnavarum
avarute nathanre siksayekkuricc nirbhayarakavatalla; tircca
avar tannalute sadacaranistha sanraksiccu pearunnavaran
tannalute bharyamarilea adhinatayilullavarilea olike. ivarumayi bandhappetunnat akseparhamalla
ennal atinappuram agrahikkunnavararea avaratre atikramikal
tannalute vasamulla suksippusvattukkal sanraksikkunnavarum karar palikkunnavarumanavar
tannalute saksyannal satyasandhamayi purttikarikkunnavarum
namaskaram nisthayeate nirvahikkunnavarum
avar svargattil atyadhikam adarikkappetunnavarayirikkum
i satyanisedhikalkk entuparri? ninre nere pannuvarikayanallea avar
itattuninnum valattuninnum kuttam kuttamayi
avarearearuttarum tan anugrhita svargattil katakkumenn keatikkukayanea
orikkalumilla! avarkkutanne nannayariyavunna vastuvil ninnan namavare pataccat
venta, udayastamaya sthanannalute nathanre peril nanita satyam ceyyunnu. nis'sansayam nam kalivurravanan
avarute sthanatt avarekkal uttamamaya janataye keantuvaran ; nam'me arum marikatakkukayilla
atinal avare vittekkuka. avarkku takkitu nalkappetta dinam varunvare avar tannalute teannivasannalilum durvrttikalilum muluki kaliyatte
avar tannalute savakutirannalil ninn purappett otiyanayunna dinamanat. tannalute laksyasthanamaya nattakkuriyilekk otiyealukunna peale
kannukal tanupeaya avasthayilayirikkum annavar. apamanam avare avaranam ceytirikkum. avarkk munnariyippu nalkappettirunna dinam atatre
nuhine nam tanre janatayilekk dutanayi niyeagiccu. “neaveriya siksa vannettum mumpe ninre janattin munnariyipp nalkuka”yenna nirdesatteate
addeham parannu: "enre janame, nan ninnalkk vyaktamaya munnariyippu nalkunnavanan
atinal ninnal allahuvin valippetuka. avane suksikkuka. enne anusarikkuka

enkil allahu ninnalkk ninnalute papannal pearuttutarum. oru niscita avadhivare ninnalkk jivikkanavasaram nalkum. allahuvinre avadhi agatamayal pinneyeattum pintikkukayilla; tircca. ninnal atarinnirunnenkil.”
nuh parannu: "natha, ravum pakalum nanenre janatte viliccum
ennal enre ksanam avare kututal akarrukayanuntayat
ni avarkk mappekanayi nan avare viliccappealeakkeyum avar katil viral tirukukayum vastram keant mutukayumayirunnu. avar tannalute dussathyattiluraccuninnu. anneyarram ahankarikkukayum ceytu
vintum nanavare urakke viliccu
pinne parasyamayum valare rahasyamayum udbeadhanam nalki
nan avasyappettu: ninnal ninnalute nathaneat mappinapeksikkuka. avan ere pearukkunnavanan
avan ninnalkk dharalam mala vilttittarum
sampattum santanannalum keant ninnale sahayikkum. ninnalkk teattannaluntakkittarum. aruvikalearukkittarum.”
ninnalkkentuparri? ninnalkk allahuvinre mahatvam ottum angikarikkanavunnillallea
ninnale vividha ghattannalilute srsticcu valarttiyat avanan
allahu onninumite marreannayi el akasannale srsticcatennaneyenn ninnal kanunnille
atil veliccamayi candrane untakki. vilakkayi suryaneyum
allahu ninnale bhumiyilninn mulappiccu valartti
pinne avan ninnale atilekkutanne matakkunnu. vintum ninnale punarujjivippicc purappetuvikkunnatan
allahu ninnalkkayi bhumiye virippakkiyirikkunnu
ninnal atile visalamaya valikalilute sancarikkan
nuh parannu: "enre natha! ivarenne dhikkariccu. ennittavar pinparriyatea tanre svattum santanavum vali nastamallateannum vardhippikkattavaneyum
avar keatiya kutantraman kaniccat
avar janatteatu parannu: “ninnal ninnalute daivannale vetiyarut. vaddineyum suva'ineyum yagusineyum ya'ukhineyum nasrineyum kaivitarut.”
avarinnane valareppere valipilappiccu. i atikramakarikalkk ni valiketallateannum vardhippiccukeatukkarute.”
tannalute tanne terrinal avare mukkikkeannu. pinne avar narakattil pravesippikkappetukayum ceytu. appeal allahuve kutate oru sahayiyeyum avarkkavite kantukittiyilla
nuh prarthiccu: "natha! i satyanisedhikalilearuttaneyum i bhumukhatt bakkivekkarute
ni avare verute vittal iniyumavar ninre dasanmare valipilappikkum. tem'matikalkkum nisedhikalkkumallate avar janmam nalkukayumilla

natha! enikkum enre matapitakkalkkum visvasikalayi enre bhavanattil katannuvarunnavarkkum satyavisvasikalkkum visvasinikalkkum ni pearuttu tarename! atikramikalkk nasamallateannum vardhippiccukeatukkarute!”
parayuka: jinnukalil kure per khur'an kettuvenn enikk divyabeadhanam labhiccirikkunnu. annane avar parannu: "vismayakaramaya oru khur'an nannal kettirikkunnu
at nervaliyilekk nayikkunnu. atinal nannalatil visvasiccirikkunnu. nannal nannalute nathanil areyum pankucerkkukayilla
nam'mute nathanre mahatvam atyunnatamatre. avan sakhiyeyea santanatteyea svikariccittilla
nannalute kuttattile vivaram kettavar allahuvekkuricc kallam parayaruntayirunnu
manusyarum jinnukalum allahuvekkuricc orikkalum kallam parayillennan nannal karutiyirunnat
manusyaril cilar jinnukalil cilareat saranam tetaruntayirunnu. atavaril 1 ahankaram valartti
allahu areyum pravacakanayi niyeagikkillenn ninnal karutiya peale avarum karutiyirunnu
nannal akasatte teattuneakki. appealat karuttaraya kavalkkaralum tijvalakalalum nirannunilkkunnatayi nannalkkanubhavappettu
akasattile cila irippitannalil mump nannal kelkkan irikkaruntayirunnu. ennal ippeal arenkilum kattukelkkukayanenkil, tanne srad'dhiccu keantirikkunna tijvalaye avann neritentivarum
bhumiyilullavarkk nasam varuttananea uddesiccat, atalla avarute nathan avare nervaliyilakkananea icchiccatenn nannalkkariyilla
nannalea, nannalil saccaritarunt. allattavarum nannalilunt. nannal bhinnamargakkaran
bhumiyil vecc allahuve parajayappetuttanea, otippeayi avane tealpikkanea sadhyamallenn nannal manas'silakkiyirikkunnu
sanmargam kettappealtanne nannalatil visvasiccu. tanre nathanil visvasikkunnavanarea, avan oruvidha nastamea pidanamea untavumenn bhayappetentatilla
nannalil valippett jivikkunnavarunt. valivitt jivikkunnavarumunt. ar kilppett jivikkunnuvea avar nervali urappakkiyirikkunnu
valivitt jivikkunnavarea avar narakattiyile virakayittirum.”
avar nervaliyil tanne uraccu nilkkukayanenkil nam avarkk kutikkan dharalamayi vellam nalkum
atilute nam avare pariksikkananat. tanre nathanre udbeadhanatte nirakaricc jivikkunnavare avan atikathina siksayilakappetuttum
pallikal allahuvinnullatan. atinal allahuveateappam marrareyum viliccu prarthikkarut
daivadasan daivatteat prarthikkanayi elunnerru ninnappeal satyanisedhikal ayalkku currum taticcukutumarayi
parayuka: nan enre nathane matrame viliccu prarthikkukayullu. areyum avanre pankaliyakkukayilla
parayuka: ninnalkk entenkilum gunamea deasamea varuttan enikkavilla
parayuka: allahuvinre siksayilninn enne raksikkan arkkumavilla. avanallate orabhayasthanavum nan kanunnilla

allahuvilninnulla vidhikalum avanre sandesavum ettikkukayennatallate oru detyavum enikkilla. ar allahuveyum avanre dutaneyum dhikkarikkunnuvea tirccayayum avannullat narakattiyan. avaratil nityavasikalayirikkum
i janattin munnariyipp nalkiya karyam neril kanumpeal avarkk beadhyamakum: arute sahayiyan durbalanennum arute sanghaman ennattil kuravennum
parayuka: ninnalkk takkitu nalkappetta siksa asannamanea atalla enre nathan atinu ninta avadhi niscayikkunnuntea enneannum enikkariyilla
